抖.definition: to tremble; to shake out; to reveal; to make it in the world

抖動.definition: to quiver; to vibrate; to shake (sth)

抖摟.definition: to shake out; to bring to light; to squander

抖擻.definition: to rouse; to invigorate; to enliven; to put sb into high spirits; con brio

抖擻精神.definition: to gather one's spirits; to pull oneself together

抖瑟.definition: to quiver; to shiver; to tremble

抖音.definition: Douyin, Chinese app for creating and sharing short videos, released in its international version as TikTok
